2. Gather the population density from recent census data or statistical reports.
3. Find the total population from reliable sources like the World Bank.
4. Obtain the proportion of merchandise trade in GDP from the latest trade reports or World Bank publications.

```

messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please sort out all African countries involved in the "Belt and Road" initiative and their capitals as of June 2025, and query the surface area (in sq.km, using 2022 statistics, rounded to an integer), population density (people/sq.km of land area, using 2022 statistics, rounded to an integer), total population (in thousand, using 2023 statistics, rounded to an integer), and the proportion of merchandise trade in GDP (in percentage of GDP, using 2023 statistics, rounded to one decimal place) of these countries according to the statistics of the World Bank. 

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table. The column names in the table are: Country, Capital City, Surface Area (km²), Population Density (people/km² of land area), Total Population (thousands), Merchandise Trade (% of GDP).
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

<think>
To start, I need to know which African countries are involved in the "Belt and Road" initiative as of June 2025.
</think>

<search> African countries involved in the Belt and Road initiative as of June 2025 </search>

Search query: African countries involved in the Belt and Road initiative as of June 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://greenfdc.org/countries-of-the-belt-and-road-initiative-bri/):
Countries of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) The countries (excluding Palestine) of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) are spread across all continents: Africa – 53 countries; Central Asia – 6 countries ...

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belt_and_Road_Initiative):
Belt and Road Initiative - Wikipedia As of May 2025, according to observers at Fudan University's Green Finance and Development Center, between 146 and 150 states were members of the Belt and Road ...

[Doc 3](https://www.cfr.org/article/china-africa-june-2025):
China in Africa: June 2025 | Council on Foreign Relations CAETE 2025 was rooted in South-South cooperation, with the China-Africa Business Council organizing a special exhibition on the matter.

From the documents provided, it seems there is an update needed for the exact number of African countries participating in the Belt and Road Initiative. However, the general list remains consistent. Let's move forward with the next step assuming the number of countries remains at least 53.

<search> List of African countries involved in the Belt and Road Initiative </search>

Search query: List of African countries involved in the Belt and Road Initiative
Result: [Doc 1](https://greenfdc.org/countries-of-the-belt-and-road-initiative-bri/):
Countries of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) The countries (excluding Palestine) of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) are spread across all continents: Africa – 53 countries; Central Asia – 6 countries ...

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belt_and_Road_Initiative):
Belt and Road Initiative - Wikipedia It aims to invest in over 150 countries and international organizations through six overland economic corridors and the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road. The BRI ...

[Doc 3](https://www.researchgate.net/figure/African-Member-States-of-the-Belt-and-Road-Initiative-as-of-April-2022_fig3_361589142):
African Member States of the Belt and Road Initiative (as of April 2022) Out of 54 African countries, 52 have already signed a BRI (Belt & Road Initiative) Memorandum of Understanding with China by April 2022.

Since the exact list is not changing much, we assume that the majority of African countries are part of the BRI initiative.

Now, let's proceed to collect the required data for each country.
</think>

<search> Surface area, population density, total population, and proportion of merchandise trade in GDP for African countries involved in the Belt and Road Initiative as of 2022 and 2023 </search>

Delivering the Belt and Road - AidData Notes: This graph shows the percentage of countries within a given region that are members of the Belt and Road Initiative as of 2022. Source: Membership data ...
